tool_description: The Best Image Recognition API offers unparalleled accuracy and versatility in analyzing images.
name: Best Image Recognition API
title: Best Image Recognition API

api_list.name: Visual Recognition AI
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-image-recognition-api.p.rapidapi.com/image_classification"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-image-recognition-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
